description technical detail:
Acer V6 Series V196LB 19" 1280 x 1024 5ms VGA LED Monitor
Ideal for use in office environments, libraries and computer labs, Professional series monitor delivers dynamic and energizing visuals. The monitor features eco-friendly technologies that save power and cut energy costs. It is ergonomically designed, with a slim and clean-cut look.
dimensions weight details: Without stand - width: 40.64 cm - depth: 5.2 cm - height: 33.7 cm - weight: 2.7 kg
dimensions wxdxh: 40.64 cm x 20.7 cm x 40.8 cm - with stand
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Acer EcoDisplay, Acer Adaptive Contrast Management (ACM)
